title: Calories in Sausage McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calories in sausage mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard fast-food Sausage McMuffin: toasted English muffin, pork sausage patty, American cheese; no egg or additional condiments.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, portion size, and preparation method. Values based on typical fast-food serving; check official labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One Sausage McMuffin has about 400 kcal, 15 g protein, and 25 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Use turkey sausage instead of pork

faqs.q: How many calories in a Sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 400 kcal for one standard Sausage McMuffin.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein per Sausage McMuffin.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: Around 810 mg of sodium, mainly from the sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, about 29 g carbs from the English muffin, with 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does adding egg change calories in sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, adding a fried egg increases it by about 80 kcal to 480 total.
